# `deanonymize()`

Use `nhost.auth.deanonymize` to deanonymize a user.

```ts
nhost.auth.deanonymize({
  signInMethod: 'email-password',
  email: 'joe@example.com'
})
```

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">params</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> [`DeanonymizeParams`](/reference/docgen/javascript/nhost-js/types/deanonymize-params)

---
